section.title: Turn on Resource Filtering in pom.xml
section.para: Above will depend on whether you use src/main or src/test for resource file(s)

section.title: Use ${variable} References in Resource Files
section.programlisting:
<properties> <!-- standard properties --> <property name="javax.persistence.jdbc.url" value="${jdbc.url}"/> <property name="javax.persistence.jdbc.driver" value="${jdbc.driver}"/> <property name="javax.persistence.jdbc.user" value="${jdbc.user}"/> <property name="javax.persistence.jdbc.password" value="${jdbc.password}"/>
<!-- hibernate-specific properties --> <property name="hibernate.dialect" value="${hibernate.dialect}"/> ... </properties>
